column4: I'm having problems reading my email with thunderbird 9 on Kubuntu 64b 11.10. I think the new update caused problems and I can't figure out how to fix them. I've tried a apt-get purge and install after backing up and deleting ~/.thunderbird but the problem persists. http://www.flickr.com/photos/53743399@N02/6831454429/ if you look at the left side there's no column with mail. when i click "read mail" nothing appears. however, if i
search for specific messages, they show up, so i know my profile is loaded correctly. Please help! this is seriously impacting my ability to work!
Please don't flood; use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste; don't use Enter as punctuation.
